titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/8/2006--Passed House without amendment. Elects majority Members to the House Committees on: (1) Appropriations; (2) the Budget; (3) Energy and Commerce; (4) Financial Services; and (5) Veterans' Affairs.
